mapper.sql: BUY_CHANGE_NO, ID, OWNER, OFFICE, TICKET_TYPE, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, VALID, STATUS, CHANGE_REMARK
h.BUY_CHANGE_NO, h.ID, h.OWNER, h.OFFICE, h.TICKET_TYPE, h.CREATOR, h.CREATE_TIME, h.MODIFIER, h.MODIFY_TIME, h.VALID, h.STATUS, h.CHANGE_REMARK
mapper.select:
select
from IFT_BUY_CHANGE_EXT h left join OS_BUYCHANGE m on h.BUY_CHANGE_NO = m.BUY_CHANGE_NO left join OS_BUYORDER k on m.BUY_ORDER_NO = k.BUY_ORDER_NO left join OS_SALECHANGE o on k.SALE_ORDER_NO = o.SALE_ORDER_NO left join IFT_SALE_CHANGE_EXT i on o.SALE_CHANGE_NO = i.SALE_CHANGE_NO where i.SALE_CHANGE_NO = #{saleChangeNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into IFT_BUY_CHANGE_EXT (BUY_CHANGE_NO, ID, OWNER, OFFICE, TICKET_TYPE, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, VALID, STATUS, CHANGE_REMARK) values (#{buyChangeNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{owner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{office,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ticketType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update IFT_BUY_CHANGE_EXT
ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OWNER = #{owner,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OFFICE = #{office,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TICKET_TYPE = #{ticketType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANGE_REMARK = #{changeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where BUY_CHANGE_NO = #{buyChangeNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update IFT_BUY_CHANGE_EXT set ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OWNER = #{owner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OFFICE = #{office,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TICKET_TYPE = #{ticketType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANGE_REMARK = #{changeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BUY_CHANGE_NO = #{buyChangeNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
